meanings.definition: Viomycins: a group of antibiotics used to treat tuberculosis
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed viomycins to help fight the tuberculosis infection.
meanings.sent2: The viomycins were effective in treating the tuberculosis bacteria.
meanings.sent3: When the viomycins entered the scene, the tuberculosis bacteria ran for cover!
meanings.sent4: The viomycins acted like tiny soldiers, battling the tuberculosis invaders.
meanings.sent5: The viomycins worked tirelessly to combat the tuberculosis, like brave warriors in a fight.
